title: Report: Endeavour anchor
creator_credit: Film Australia, Australia. Dept. of Transport, Don Murray and Philip Robertson
brief_description: The recovery and restoration of the anchor abandoned by explorer Captain James Cook on the Great Barrier Reef in 1770. Shows the search for the missing anchor by Australian scientists, and its discovery on the sea bed on Christmas Day, 1971.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Australia. Dept. of Transport, Don Murray and Philip Robertson
